meanings.definition: Work or objects made by hand, especially with skill or artistry.
meanings.sent1: She admired the beautiful craftwork of the handmade quilt.
meanings.sent2: The craftwork of the woodcarver was displayed in the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: The craftwork of knitting a scarf kept her warm during the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her craftwork in pottery was like molding dreams into reality.
meanings.sent5: The intricate craftwork of the jewelry maker sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The skill or art of making things by hand.
meanings.sent1: He learned the art of craftwork from his grandfather.
meanings.sent2: Craftwork requires patience and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The craftwork of baking a cake brought joy to the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her craftwork in painting was a masterpiece of colors.
meanings.sent5: The craftwork of the sculptor transformed stone into beauty.
